entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 07:43 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: ENE 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain showers at times heavy this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
